page.title: 16Belstead Brook Hotel
page.content: This is an interview with the manager- ess of the hotel. On week days we get business people, and week-ends we get people for short holidays. We get people from all walks of life. We've got 32 bedrooms in the hotel and the majority of bedrooms are full every night. We have lots of famous people staying - I can't tell you how many: Dr Hook, Imagination, Barbara Dixon, Cannon & Ball, Hot Chocolate, Boy George. We also have lots of football teams, for example, Liverpool, Chelsea and South- ampton. We have an a la carte menu which changes once every three months. Turnover is roughly 13 to 14 thousand pounds a week; it is sometimes more, sometimes less. So our turnover is about 700,000 pounds a year. Cont P17.
